titleStmt.title: A Protestant antidote against the poyson of popery clearly proving the religion of the Church of Rome to be 1. superstitious, 2. idolatrous, 3. damnable, 4. bloody, 5. novel, 6. inconsistent with the publick peace, 7. irreconciliable to true Christianity ... / by Christopher Nesse ...
titleStmt.author: Ness, Christopher, 1621-1705.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
